\SKOOT client codes/actions\\\These codes are used with the Act() action \\"!client_control\\", for example: Act(\\\\\$actor, \\"!client_control\\", \$id: !SKOOT_MAPURL, \$val: \\"http://www.google.se/images/hp0.gif\\");\\\# define !SKOOT_MAPURL 1\\\\r\\n\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_ARTURL 2\\\\r\\n\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_REALMURL 3\\\\r\\n\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_BIGMAPURL 4\\\\r\\n\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_COMPASS 5\\\\r\\n\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_ANYURL 6\\\r\\n\\\# define !SKOOT_PLAYERS_CLEAR 20\\\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_PLAYERS_ENTER 21\\\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_PLAYERS_LEAVE 22\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_OBJECTS_CLEAR 30\\\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_OBJECTS_ENTER 31\\\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_OBJECTS_LEAVE 32\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_INVENTORY_CLEAR 40\\\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_INVENTORY_ENTER 41\\\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_INVENTORY_LEAVE 42\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_EXITS_CLEAR 50\\\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_EXITS_ADD 51\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_CHATMODE_ON 60\\\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_CHATMODE_OFF 61\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\# define !SKOOT_TOOL_SOURCE 70\\\\r\\n\\\r\\n\The last 3 are more for internal use only than the others.\\\\r\\n\\\\\\"
